workshop.title: Big Data SQL Hands on Lab
workshop.description: Use Oracle SQL to query data across your data lake.

labs.title: Workshop Introduction
labs.description: Background on the workshop and links to content to get started.

labs.title: Lab 100:  Review Ridership
labs.description: Use Zeppelin to review ridership info in Oracle Database.  Add Big Data SQL tables that access weather data in Oracle Object Store.

labs.title: Lab 200:  Gather Station Details
labs.description: Review JSON data in HDFS using Hue.  Create Big Data SQL tables to access data and Oracle SQL to query the JSON data.

labs.title: Lab 300: Understand Trips and Bike Usage
labs.description: Create a Big Data SQL table over partitioned Hive table.  Run analytic queries combining data from various sources to understand bike usage.

labs.title: Lab 400: Current Station Status
labs.description: Create a Kafka producer that sends messages about current station status.  Create Big Data SQL table over Kafka stream to understand current bike distribution.

labs.title: Lab 500: Securing data
labs.description: Use Oracle Virtual Private Database and Redaction to keep data safe.
